snippet.title: Block Gun - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2382410/Block_Gun/
Join us on discord : https://discord.gg/Z7JGJHxjmz

BLOCKGUN is a fast paced 3D Platformer speedrun oriented in which you have to infiltrate a computer system. But don't worry you have a block gun ! Use blocks to create platform to make a path to the end of each level and finish each level as quick as possible !

Thanks to your block gun you will be able to infiltrate the system. Depending on how long you charge your gun, you will shoot different projectile:

A short charging will shoot a simple bullet that allows you to trigger some interrupter and mechanisms.

A medium time charging will shoot a sticky platform allowing you to jump on it to reach the end of levels.

A long time charging will shoot a moving platform that will get destroyed after few seconds.
